class_notes: EHS students only-The nature of a teaching assistantship varies from department to department. The defining characteristic of this position across all departments and programs is a controlled, carefully monitored initial teaching opportunity. A teaching assistant may be responsible for 10 to 12 hours per week of discussion or laboratory supervision. TATT 600 is a required pre-requisite.
